content:
Mustang News

Cal Poly San Luis Obispos News Source

Briana Whitney

follow id BrianaWhitney

Theres a new place on campus where students can go to get advice PERIOD

The Mustang Success Center offers students a place to talk with professional advisers and student counselors PERIOD

The center opened at the beginning of the quarter but Mustang Success Center director Shannon Stephens said they have already helped students solve many problems PERIOD

The first couple weeks we actually had a lot of students before the adddrop deadline Stephens said PERIOD There were a lot of students asking us how to add classes with permission numbers PERIOD We also got a lot of questions about change of major. the center is temporarily located in Science building  room D37 PERIOD It will move once the remodel to the front of the building is complete PERIOD
